public class MyPeriodicEvent extends SimEvent {
  private Simulation sim;
  private double period; // [sec]

  public MyPeriodicEvent(long timestamp, double period, Simulation sim) {
    super(timestamp);
    this.sim = sim;
    this.period= period;
  }

  public void execute() {
    // do X here

    // reschedule for next execution:
    sim.addEvent(new MyPeriodicEvent(timestamp + (long) (1000 * period), period, sim));
  }
